messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] North Carolina
messages.msgSnippet: maybe you could check into hendersonville. it is near ashville and beautiful!!  i live about an hour from there and go into cherokee and galenburg tn, alot. i
messages.messageBody:
maybe you could check into hendersonville. it is near ashville and
beautiful!! i live about an hour from there and go into cherokee and
galenburg tn, alot. i feel lucky to be able to live here. hope you find
something you live!!
tina


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] North Carolina
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/18/02 6:31:48 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Kelly, I am not Yol but where exactly are you looking.  We live in the foothills not in the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/18/02 6:31:48 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> We're looking for land in NC, along the Blue Ridge. Fifteen acres. There
> will
> be three families (we're the only ones with kids). Round homes, solar and
> wind for energy, alpacas, gentle living. Water, Southern exposure, and
> views
> are "musts".
>
> Know of anything? <g>
>
> ~Kelly
>
>
>
>

Kelly,
I am not Yol but where exactly are you looking. We live in the foothills not
in the mountains but in Valdese. The lady down the road is selling I want to
say about 50 acres but in different lots. Little old lady I htink.
Pam G.

messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/18/02 6:31:37 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I dont know of any land right off hand for sale.. But I DO know that area is beautiful and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/18/02 6:31:37 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> We're looking for land in NC, along the Blue Ridge. Fifteen acres. There
> will
> be three families (we're the only ones with kids). Round homes, solar and
> wind for energy, alpacas, gentle living. Water, Southern exposure, and
> views
> are "musts".
>
> Know of anything? <g>

I dont know of any land right off hand for sale.. But I DO know that area is
beautiful and well suited for your needs. Both my parents grew up in the NC
mountains and I would love to move to the high country myself.

Teresa

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] North Carolina
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/18/2002 1:03:10 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yol, We re looking for land in NC, along the Blue Ridge. Fifteen acres. There will be three
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/18/2002 1:03:10 PM Eastern Standard Time,
bluelotus@... writes:
> Dhyanyoga Center of North Carolina
> Meditation - Kundalini Maha Yoga
> Weaverville, NC
> www.dyc-nc.org


Yol,

We're looking for land in NC, along the Blue Ridge. Fifteen acres. There will
be three families (we're the only ones with kids). Round homes, solar and
wind for energy, alpacas, gentle living. Water, Southern exposure, and views
are "musts".

Know of anything? <g>

~Kelly
